text: The following is a list of all genocides which have an upper estimated death count over 1000: * The Holocaust * Aktion T4 * German crimes committed against Soviet war prisoners * Holodomor * German Crimes Against Poland * The Porrajmos * Persecution of homosexuals in Nazi Germany * Persecution of Jehovah's Witnesses in Nazi Germany * Circassian genocide * Cambodian Genocide * Armenian Genocide * Rwandan Genocide * Greek Genocide * Dzungar genocide * Genocide in Bangladesh * Assyrian genocide * Holocaust in Croatia * Massacres of Hutus during the First Congo War * Romani Genocide * Polish Operation of the NKVD * Deportation of the Chechens and Ingush * Genocide of Acholi and Lango people under Idi Amin * Darfur Genocide * East Timor Genocide * Ikiza * Massacres of Poles in Volhynia and Eastern Galicia * Effacer le tableau * Isaaq genocide * Anfal Genocide * Genocide against Bosniaks and Croats by the Chetniks * Deportation of the Crimean Tatars * Herero and Namaqua genocide * Guatemalan genocide * California Genocide * Queensland Aboriginal genocide * Rohingya genocide * Bosnian genocide * Parsley massacre * Nuba Genocide * 1804 Haiti Massacre * Selk'nam genocide * Genocide of Yazidis by the Islamic State * Moriori Genocide * Black War * Gaza genocide (2023-present) * Ingrian Genocide * Tamil Genocide (Eezham Genocide, Sri Lanka) * Kosovo Genocide(1999) Category:Genocide
title: List of genocides
